property.name: include
property.value: Map:Common Data

property.name: description
property.value: A replica of the [[Shelter]] from [[Hometown]]. Contains the [[Shadow Mantle Holder]].

property.name: page
property.value: Manhole Dungeon#Shelter

property.name: description
property.value: A Black Monster. Follows [[HERO_SWORD]]'s movements and must be guided to the bottom-right pressure plate to solve the puzzle. Once the pressure plate is pressed, [[Kris]] takes control of the monster and must take it to HERO_SWORD, after which HERO_SWORD automatically kills it.

property.name: description
property.value: [[HERO_SWORD]] exits the game screen from this point, leaving [[Kris]] to pick up the [[Shadow Mantle]].

property.name: description
property.value: [[Tenna]] explains how his partnership with [[Spamton]] fell apart and laments the fact that [[Kris]] brought the laptop to their house. Upon noticing Kris, Tenna tells them that he had done what they asked him to do and asks them not to turn him off again. [[HERO_SWORD]] kills Tenna's character to continue forward.

property.name: description
property.value: Treasure chest containing the Shadow Mantle.

property.name: page
property.value: Shadow Mantle
